A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute rubbish. I've liked every starwars movie up until this one\, but I hated it. I felt nothing when the end credits rolled up on the screen\, I felt empty walking out of the cinema. I can say I've never had that happen before.\n\nEvery direction the movie went felt like it was the wrong choice. They threw the character of Luke Skywalker under the bus\, such a cop out how they made him bow out of the story.
